scripts.start-win: node prepbuild.js win && npx qbrt run webapp
scripts.start-mac: node prepbuild.js mac && npx qbrt run webapp
scripts.pack-win: node prepbuild.js win && npx qbrt package webapp && node postbuild.js win
scripts.dist-win: node prepbuild.js win && npx qbrt package webapp && node postbuild.js win
scripts.pack-mac: node prepbuild.js mac && npx qbrt package webapp && node postbuild.js mac
scripts.dist-mac: node prepbuild.js mac && npx qbrt package webapp && node postbuild.js mac
